description: Ministry of Labour and Labour Relations - Appointed Mr. S. M. S. Jayawardana as arbitrator for settle the dispute between Mr. K. P. Ranaweera and Nottons Lanka Garments (Pvt.) Ltd. - Appointed Mr. M. D. K. Kulatunga as arbitrator for settle the dispute between Mr. W. M. Dhanasooriya & Three Others of the One Part and National Housing Development Authority
